attributes.action: restore death by judicial hanging by a silk rope as an option in trials for murder or murders with sexual crimes which are an outrage to the community, and must be met with the ultimate punishment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the people of Great Britain, ask the Prime Minister Gordon Brown to consider removing Britain from the Human Rights Act and from Europe, and only act as a trading partner with Europe, so that we may have the option to re-instigate the ultimate punishment for crimes of great outrage such as brutal murders, serial murders, and sexually related murders of adults and children. We also ask Gordon Brown to re-consider introducing capital punishment as a mandatory punishment for anyone over the age of 21 who murders a Police Officer, whilst on duty.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
